00077 template<class Target> Target convertFromStr(const string& str)
00078 {
00079     stringstream convertor;
00080     Target result;
00081 
00082     if(!(convertor << str) || !(convertor >> result) || !(convertor >> ws).eof())
00083     {
00084         cerr << "error in converting value from " << str << ", use default value instead." << endl;
00085         return Target();
00086     }
00087 
00088     return result;
00089 }
00090

00096 inline string* getMapValue(map<string, string>& map, const string& key)
00097 {
00098         std::map<string, string>::iterator itr = map.find( key );
00099         if( itr == map.end() )
00100                 return 0;
00101         return &itr->second;
00102 }

00111 JMA_Knowledge::~JMA_Knowledge()

00114     if(hasUserDict())
00115     {
00116         if(! removeFile(tempUserDic_))

00128 bool JMA_Knowledge::hasUserDict() const
00129 {
00130     return ! userDictNames_.empty();

00133 bool JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()
00134 {
00135     const size_t userDictNum = userDictNames_.size();
00136 
00137 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00138     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()" << endl;
00139     if(userDictNum != 0)
00140     {
00141         cout << "user dictionary: ";
00142         for(size_t i=0; i<userDictNum; ++i)
00143         {
00144             cout << userDictNames_[i] << " ";
00145         }
00146         cout << endl;
00147     }
00148 #endif
00149 
00150     if(userDictNum == 0)
00151     {
00152         return false;
00153     }
00154 
00155     // remove the temporary user binary file if exists
00156     if(! tempUserDic_.empty())
00157     {
00158         if(! removeFile(tempUserDic_))
00159         {
00160             cerr << "fail to delete tempUserDic_ file: " << tempUserDic_ << endl;
00161         }
00162     }
00163 
00164     // temporary csv file for user dictionary
00165     string tempUserCSVFile;
00166 
00167     // convert user dictionaries to a csv file
00168     if(! createTempFile(tempUserCSVFile))
00169     {
00170         cerr << "fail to create a temporary user dictionary csv file" << endl;
00171         return false;
00172     }
00173 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00174     cout << "temporary file name of user csv file: " << tempUserCSVFile << endl;
00175 #endif
00176 
00177     ofstream ostream(tempUserCSVFile.c_str());
00178     if(! ostream)
00179     {
00180         cerr << "fail to open temporary user CSV file: " << tempUserCSVFile << endl;
00181         return false;
00182     }
00183 
00184     // append source files of user dictionary
00185     unsigned int entryCount = 0;
00186     for(size_t i=0; i<userDictNum; ++i)
00187         entryCount += convertTxtToCSV(userDictNames_[i].c_str(), ostream);
00188 
00189 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00190     cout << entryCount << " entries in user dictionaries altogether." << endl;
00191 #endif
00192     if(entryCount == 0)
00193     {
00194         cerr << "fail to compile the empty user dictionary." << endl;
00195         return false;
00196     }
00197 
00198     // create a unique temporary file for user dictionary in binary type
00199     bool tempResult = createTempFile(tempUserDic_);
00200     if(! tempResult)
00201     {
00202         cerr << "fail to create a temporary user dictionary binary file" << endl;
00203         return false;
00204     }
00205 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00206     cout << "temporary file name of binary user dictionary: " << tempUserDic_ << endl;
00207 #endif
00208 
00209     // construct parameter to compile user dictionary
00210     vector<char*> compileParam;
00211     compileParam.push_back((char*)"JMA_Knowledge");
00212     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-d");
00213     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(systemDictPath_.c_str()));
00214     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-u");
00215     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(tempUserDic_.c_str()));
00216 
00217     // the encoding type of text user dictionary could be predefined by the "dictionary-charset" entry in "dicrc" file under binary system directory path,
00218     // if the text encoding type is not predefined in "dicrc", it would be "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00219     // below is to set the encoding type of binary user dictionary, which is "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00220     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-t");
00221     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(ENCODE_TYPE_STR_[getEncodeType()]));
00222 
00223     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(tempUserCSVFile.c_str()));
00224 
00225 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00226     cout << "parameter of mecab_dict_index() to compile user dictionary: ";
00227     for(size_t i=0; i<compileParam.size(); ++i)
00228     {
00229         cout << compileParam[i] << " ";
00230     }
00231     cout << endl;
00232 #endif
00233 
00234     // compile user dictionary files into binary type
00235     int compileResult = mecab_dict_index(compileParam.size(), &compileParam[0]);
00236     if(compileResult != 0)
00237     {
00238         cerr << "fail to compile user ditionary" << endl;
00239         return false;
00240     }
00241 
00242     // as the binary user dictionary is created,
00243     // remove the temporary user csv file
00244     if(! removeFile(tempUserCSVFile))
00245     {
00246         cerr << "fail to delete tempUserCSVFile file: " << tempUserCSVFile << endl;
00247     }
00248 
00249     return true;
00250 }

00252 MeCab::Tagger* JMA_Knowledge::createTagger() const
00253 {
00254     // construct parameter to create tagger
00255     string taggerParam("-d ");
00256     taggerParam += systemDictPath_;
00257 
00258     if(hasUserDict())
00259     {
00260         assert(! tempUserDic_.empty() && "the temporary file of user dictionary in binary format should have been created by JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()");
00261 
00262         // append the name of user dictionary binary file to the parameter of tagger creation
00263         taggerParam += " -u ";
00264         taggerParam += tempUserDic_;
00265     }
00266 
00267 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00268     cout << "parameter of MeCab::createTagger() to create MeCab::Tagger: " << taggerParam << endl << endl;
00269 #endif
00270 
00271     // create tagger by loading dictioanry files
00272     return MeCab::createTagger(taggerParam.c_str());
00273 }

00285 bool JMA_Knowledge::loadConfig0(const char *filename, map<string, string>& map) {
00286   std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00287   if(!ifs)
00288   {
00289       cerr << "cannot open configuration file: " << filename << endl;
00290       return false;
00291   }
00292 
00293   std::string line;
00294   while (std::getline(ifs, line)) {
00295     // remove carriage return character
00296     line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00297 
00298     if (line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#') continue;
00299 
00300     size_t pos = line.find('=');
00301     if(pos == std::string::npos)
00302     {
00303         cerr << "format error in configuration file: " << filename << ", line: " << line << endl;
00304         return false;
00305     }
00306 
00307     size_t s1, s2;
00308     for (s1 = pos+1; s1 < line.size() && isspace(line[s1]); s1++);
00309     for (s2 = pos-1; static_cast<long>(s2) >= 0 && isspace(line[s2]); s2--);
00310     //const std::string value = line.substr(s1, line.size() - s1);
00311     //const std::string key   = line.substr(0, s2 + 1);
00312     map[line.substr(0, s2 + 1)] = line.substr(s1, line.size() - s1);
00313   }
00314 
00315   return true;
00316 }
00317 
00318 void JMA_Knowledge::loadDictConfig()
00319 {
00320     string configFile = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), DICT_CONFIG_FILES[0]);
00321     map<string, string> configMap;
00322 
00323     if(! loadConfig0(configFile.c_str(), configMap))
00324     {
00325         cerr << "warning: " << configFile << " not exists," << endl;
00326         cerr << "default configuration value is used." << endl;
00327     }
00328 
00329     string* value = getMapValue(configMap, "base-form-feature-offset");
00330     baseFormOffset_ = value ? convertFromStr<int>(*value) : BASE_FORM_OFFSET_DEFAULT;
00331 
00332     value = getMapValue(configMap, "read-form-feature-offset");
00333     readFormOffset_ = value ? convertFromStr<int>(*value) : READ_FORM_OFFSET_DEFAULT;
00334 
00335     value = getMapValue(configMap, "feature-token-size");
00336     featureTokenSize_ = value ? convertFromStr<size_t>(*value) : FEATURE_TOKEN_SIZE_DEFAULT;
00337 
00338     value = getMapValue(configMap, "default-pos");
00339     defaultPOS_ = value ? *value : DEFAULT_POS_DEFAULT;
00340 
00341     value = getMapValue(configMap, "config-charset");
00342     configEncodeType_ = Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM; // reset
00343     if(value)
00344         configEncodeType_ = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(value->c_str());
00345 
00346     if(configEncodeType_ == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00347     {
00348         configEncodeType_ = DEFAULT_CONFIG_ENCODE_TYPE;
00349         cerr << "unknown dictionary config charset, use default charset " << DEFAULT_CONFIG_ENCODE_TYPE << endl;
00350     }
00351 
00352 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00353     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::loadDictConfig() loads:" << endl;
00354     cout << "configFile: " << configFile << endl;
00355     cout << "base form feature offset: " << baseFormOffset_ << endl;
00356     cout << "read form feature offset: " << readFormOffset_ << endl;
00357     cout << "feature token size: " << featureTokenSize_ << endl;
00358     cout << "defaut POS: " << defaultPOS_ << endl;
00359     cout << "config charset: " << configEncodeType_ << endl;
00360 #endif
00361 }

00363 bool JMA_Knowledge::loadPOSFeatureMapping()
00364 {
00365         string configFile = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE);
00366         posFeatureMap_.clear();
00367         return loadConfig0( configFile.c_str(), posFeatureMap_ );
00368 }
00369 
00370 int JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()
00371 {
00372     // file "dicrc"
00373     loadDictConfig();
00374 
00375     // file "pos-id.def"
00376     string posFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), POS_ID_DEF_FILE);
00377     // load POS table
00378     if(! posTable_.loadConfig(posFileName.c_str(), configEncodeType_, getEncodeType()))
00379     {
00380         cerr << "fail in POSTable::loadConfig() to load " << posFileName << endl;
00381         return 0;
00382     }
00383 
00384     // file "pos-combine.def"
00385     string posCombineName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE);
00386     // load POS combine rules
00387     if(! posTable_.loadCombineRule(posCombineName.c_str()))
00388     {
00389         cerr << "warning: as " << posCombineName << " not exists, no rules is defined to combine tokens with specific POS tags" << endl;
00390     }
00391 
00392     // file "kana-map.def"
00393     string kanaFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), KANA_MAP_DEF_FILE);
00394     // load kana conversion map
00395     if(! kanaTable_.loadConfig(kanaFileName.c_str(), configEncodeType_, getEncodeType()))
00396     {
00397         cerr << "warning: as fails to load " << kanaFileName << ", no mapping is defined to convert between Hiragana and Katakana characters." << endl;
00398     }
00399 
00400     if(! loadPOSFeatureMapping() )
00401         cerr << "Fail to load POS - Feature Mapping, User dictionary can't work" << endl;
00402     else
00403         defaultFeature_ = getMapValue(posFeatureMap_, defaultPOS_);
00404 
00405 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00406     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00407     cout << "system dictionary path: " << systemDictPath_ << endl;
00408 #endif
00409 
00410     if(hasUserDict())
00411     {
00412         if(! compileUserDict())
00413         {
00414             cerr << "fail to compile user dictionary in JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00415             return 0;
00416         }
00417     }
00418 
00419     // load into temporary instance to check the result
00420     MeCab::Tagger* tagger = createTagger();
00421     if(! tagger)
00422     {
00423         cerr << "fail to create MeCab::Tagger in JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00424         return 0;
00425     }
00426 
00427     // destroy the temporary instance
00428     delete tagger;
00429 
00430     return 1;
00431 }
00432 
00433 int JMA_Knowledge::loadStopWordDict(const char* fileName)
00434 {
00435         ifstream in(fileName);
00436     if(!in)
00437     {
00438         cerr << "cannot open file: " << fileName << endl;
00439         return 0;
00440     }
00441 
00442         string line;
00443         while(!in.eof())
00444         {
00445                 getline(in, line);
00446                 if(line.length() <= 0)
00447                         continue;
00448                 stopWords_.insert(line);
00449         }
00450         in.close();
00451         return 1;
00452 }

00454 int JMA_Knowledge::encodeSystemDict(const char* txtDirPath, const char* binDirPath)
00455 {
00456     assert(txtDirPath && binDirPath);
00457 
00458 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00459     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::encodeSystemDict()" << endl;
00460     cout << "path of source system dictionary: " << txtDirPath << endl;
00461     cout << "path of binary system dictionary: " << binDirPath << endl;
00462 #endif
00463 
00464     // check if the directory paths exist
00465     if(isDirExist(txtDirPath) == false)
00466     {
00467         cerr << "directory path not exist to compile system dictionary: " << txtDirPath << endl;
00468         return 0;
00469     }
00470     if(isDirExist(binDirPath) == false)
00471     {
00472         cerr << "directory path not exist to compile system dictionary: " << binDirPath << endl;
00473         return 0;
00474     }
00475 
00476     // construct parameter to compile system dictionary
00477     vector<char*> compileParam;
00478     compileParam.push_back((char*)"JMA_Knowledge");
00479     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-d");
00480     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(txtDirPath));
00481     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-o");
00482     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(binDirPath));
00483 
00484     // the source encoding type could be predefined by the "dictionary-charset" entry in "dicrc" file under source directory path,
00485     // if the source encoding type is not predefined in "dicrc", it would be "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00486     // below is to set the destination encoding type, which is "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00487     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-t");
00488     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(ENCODE_TYPE_STR_[getEncodeType()]));
00489 
00490 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00491     cout << "parameter of mecab_dict_index() to compile system dictionary: ";
00492     for(size_t i=0; i<compileParam.size(); ++i)
00493     {
00494         cout << compileParam[i] << " ";
00495     }
00496     cout << endl;
00497 #endif
00498 
00499     // compile system dictionary files into binary type
00500     int compileResult = mecab_dict_index(compileParam.size(), &compileParam[0]);
00501     if(compileResult != 0)
00502     {
00503         cerr << "fail to compile system ditionary" << endl;
00504         return 0;
00505     }
00506 
00507     // copy configure and definition files to the destination directory
00508     size_t configNum = sizeof(DICT_CONFIG_FILES) / sizeof(DICT_CONFIG_FILES[0]);
00509     string src, dest;
00510     for(size_t i=0; i<configNum; ++i)
00511     {
00512         src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, DICT_CONFIG_FILES[i]);
00513         dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, DICT_CONFIG_FILES[i]);
00514 
00515         if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00516         {
00517             return 0;
00518         }
00519     }
00520 
00521     // if pos-id.def exists, copy it to the destination directory
00522     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, POS_ID_DEF_FILE);
00523     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, POS_ID_DEF_FILE);
00524     if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00525     {
00526         cout << POS_ID_DEF_FILE << " is not found in " << txtDirPath << ", default POS index would be 1." << endl;
00527     }
00528 
00529     // if pos-feature.def exists, copy it to the destination directory
00530     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE);
00531     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE);
00532     if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00533     {
00534         cout << POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE << " is not found in " << txtDirPath << ", no default feature is defined for those words in user dictionary." << endl;
00535     }
00536 
00537     // if pos-combine.def exists, copy it to the destination directory
00538     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE);
00539     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE);
00540     if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00541     {
00542         cout << POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE << " is not found in " << txtDirPath << ", no rule is defined to combine tokens with specific POS." << endl;
00543     }
00544 
00545     // if kana-map.def exists, copy it to the destination directory
00546     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, KANA_MAP_DEF_FILE);
00547     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, KANA_MAP_DEF_FILE);
00548     if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00549     {
00550         cout << KANA_MAP_DEF_FILE << " is not found in " << txtDirPath << ", no mapping is defined to convert between Hiragana and Katakana characters." << endl;
00551     }
00552 
00553     return 1;
00554 }

00556 bool JMA_Knowledge::isStopWord(const string& word) const
00557 {
00558         return stopWords_.find(word) != stopWords_.end() || ctype_->isSpace(word.c_str());
00559 }

00571 bool JMA_Knowledge::createTempFile(std::string& tempName)
00572 {
00573 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00574     // directory name for temporary file
00575     char dirName[MAX_PATH];
00576 
00577     // retrieve the directory path designated for temporary files
00578     DWORD dirResult = GetTempPath(MAX_PATH, dirName);
00579     if(dirResult == 0)
00580     {
00581         cerr << "fail in GetTempPath() to get the directory path for temporary file" << endl;
00582         return false;
00583     }
00584 
00585     // file name for temporary file
00586     char fileName[MAX_PATH];
00587 
00588     // create a unique temporary file
00589     UINT nameResult = GetTempFileName(dirName, "jma", 0, fileName);
00590     if(nameResult == 0)
00591     {
00592         cerr << "fail in GetTempFileName() to create a temporary file" << endl;
00593         return false;
00594     }
00595 
00596     tempName = fileName;
00597 #else
00598     // file name for temporary file
00599     char fileName[] = "/tmp/jmaXXXXXX";
00600 
00601     // create a unique temporary file
00602     int tempFd = mkstemp(fileName);
00603     if(tempFd == -1)
00604     {
00605         cerr << "fail in mkstemp() to create a temporary file" << endl;
00606         return false;
00607     }
00608 
00609     tempName = fileName;
00610 #endif
00611 
00612     return true;
00613 }

00615 bool JMA_Knowledge::removeFile(const std::string& fileName)

00617     if(unlink(fileName.c_str()) == 0)
00618     {
00619         return true;
00620     }
00621     else
00622     {
00623         return false;
00624     }

00626 
00627 bool JMA_Knowledge::isDirExist(const char* dirPath)
00628 {
00629     if(dirPath == 0)
00630     {
00631         return false;
00632     }
00633 
00634     bool result = false;
00635 
00636 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00637     WIN32_FIND_DATA wfd;
00638     HANDLE hFind;
00639 
00640     // the parameter string in function "FindFirstFile()" would be invalid if it ends with a trailing backslash (\) or slash (/),
00641     // so the trailing backslash or slash is removed if it exists
00642     string dirStr(dirPath);
00643     size_t len = dirStr.size();
00644     if(len > 0 && (dirPath[len-1] == '\\'  || dirPath[len-1] == '/' ))
00645     {
00646         dirStr.erase(len-1, 1);
00647     }
00648 
00649     hFind = FindFirstFile(dirStr.c_str(), &wfd);
00650     if(hFind != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00651     {
00652         result = true;
00653     }
00654     FindClose(hFind);
00655 #else
00656     DIR *dir = opendir(dirPath);
00657     if(dir)
00658     {
00659         result = true;
00660     }
00661     closedir(dir);
00662 #endif
00663 
00664     return result;
00665 }
00666 
00667 bool JMA_Knowledge::copyFile(const char* src, const char* dest)
00668 {
00669     assert(src && dest);
00670 
00671     // open files
00672     ifstream from(src);
00673     if(! from)
00674     {
00675         cerr << "cannot open source file: " << src << endl;
00676         return false;
00677     }
00678 
00679     ofstream to(dest);
00680     if(! to)
00681     {
00682         cerr << "cannot open destinatioin file: " << dest << endl;
00683         return false;
00684     }
00685 
00686     // copy characters
00687     char ch;
00688     while(from.get(ch))
00689     {
00690         to.put(ch);
00691     }
00692 
00693     // check file state
00694     if(!from.eof() || !to)
00695     {
00696         cerr << "invalid file state after copy from " << src << " to " << dest << endl;
00697         return false;
00698     }
00699 
00700     return true;
00701 }
00702 
00703 std::string JMA_Knowledge::createFilePath(const char* dir, const char* file)
00704 {
00705     assert(file && "the file name is assumed as non empty");
00706 
00707     string result = dir;
00708 
00709 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00710     if(result.size() && result[result.size()-1] != '\\')
00711     {
00712         result += '\\';
00713     }
00714 #else
00715     if(result.size() && result[result.size()-1] != '/')
00716     {
00717         result += '/';
00718     }
00719 #endif
00720 
00721     result += file;
00722     return result;
00723 }
00724 
00725 JMA_CType* JMA_Knowledge::getCType()
00726 {
00727         return ctype_;
00728 }
00729 
00730 void JMA_Knowledge::onEncodeTypeChange(EncodeType type)
00731 {
00732         delete ctype_;
00733         ctype_ = JMA_CType::instance(type);
00734 }
00735 
00736 bool JMA_Knowledge::isSentenceSeparator(const char* p)
00737 {
00738         unsigned int bytes = ctype_->getByteCount(p);
00739         const unsigned char* uc = (const unsigned char*)p;
00740 
00741         switch(bytes)
00742         {
00743                 case 1:
00744                         return seps_[1].contains( uc[0] );
00745                 case 2:
00746                         return seps_[2].contains( uc[0] << 8 | uc[1]);
00747                 case 3:
00748                         return seps_[3].contains( uc[0] << 16 | uc[1] << 8 | uc[2] );
00749                 case 4:
00750                         return seps_[4].contains( uc[0] << 24 | uc[1] << 16 | uc[2] << 8 | uc[3] );
00751                 default:
00752                         assert(false && "Cannot handle Character's length > 4");
00753         }
00754 
00755         return false;
00756 }
00757 
00758 bool JMA_Knowledge::addSentenceSeparator(unsigned int val)
00759 {
00760         return seps_[getOccupiedBytes(val)].insert(val);
00761 }
00762 
00763 unsigned int JMA_Knowledge::getOccupiedBytes(unsigned int val)
00764 {
00765         unsigned int ret = 1;
00766         while( val & 0xffffff00 )
00767         {
00768                 val >>= 4;
00769                 ++ ret;
00770         }
00771         assert( ret > 0 && ret < 4 );
00772         return ret;
00773 }
00774 
00775 int JMA_Knowledge::loadSentenceSeparatorConfig(const char* fileName)
00776 {
00777         ifstream in(fileName);
00778     if(!in)
00779     {
00780         cerr << "cannot open file: " << fileName << endl;
00781         return 0;
00782     }
00783 
00784         string line;
00785         while(!in.eof())
00786         {
00787                  getline(in, line);
00788                 //ignore the empty line and comment line(start with '#')
00789                 if( line.empty() || line[0] == '#' )
00790                         continue;
00791                 unsigned int bytes = ctype_->getByteCount( line.c_str() );
00792 
00793                 const unsigned char* uc = (const unsigned char*)line.c_str();
00794 
00795                 switch(bytes)
00796                 {
00797                         case 1:
00798                                 seps_[1].insert( uc[0] );
00799                                 break;
00800                         case 2:
00801                                 seps_[2].insert( uc[0] << 8 | uc[1]);
00802                                 break;
00803                         case 3:
00804                                 seps_[3].insert( uc[0] << 16 | uc[1] << 8 | uc[2] );
00805                                 break;
00806                         case 4:
00807                                 seps_[4].insert( uc[0] << 24 | uc[1] << 16 | uc[2] << 8 | uc[3] );
00808                                 break;
00809                         default:
00810                                 assert(false && "Cannot handle 'Character's length > 4'");
00811                                 break;
00812                 }
00813         }
00814         in.close();
00815         return 1;
00816 }
00817 
00818 bool JMA_Knowledge::isDictFeature( const char* str, bool includeWord )
00819 {
00820         size_t tokenSize = includeWord ? 0 : 1;
00821         while(*str)
00822         {
00823                 if(*str == ',')
00824                         ++tokenSize;
00825                 ++str;
00826         }
00827         return tokenSize == featureTokenSize_;
00828 }
00829 
00830 unsigned int JMA_Knowledge::convertTxtToCSV(const char* userDicFile, ofstream& ostream)
00831 {
00832     unsigned int count = 0;
00833 
00834         ifstream in(userDicFile);
00835         if( !in )
00836         {
00837                 cerr << "Can't Find User Dictionary " << userDicFile << ", and IGNORE this file." << endl;
00838                 return count;
00839         }
00840 
00841         cout<<"Converting User Dictionary " << userDicFile << " ..." << endl;
00842 
00843         string line;
00844         while( !in.eof() )
00845         {
00846                 getline(in, line);
00847                 trimSelf(line);
00848                 if(line.empty())
00849                         continue;
00850 
00851                 vector<string> vec;
00852                 stringToVector( line, vec );
00853                 if(vec.empty())
00854                         continue;
00855 
00856                 size_t vecSize = vec.size();
00857                 string& word = vec[0];
00858                 if( vecSize == 1 )
00859                 {
00860                         if( isDictFeature( word.c_str(), true) )
00861                                 ostream << word << endl;
00862                         else if( defaultFeature_ )
00863                                 ostream << vec[0] << "," << *defaultFeature_ << endl;
00864             ++count;
00865                         continue;
00866                 }
00867 
00868                 set<string> usedFeatures;
00869                 for( size_t i = 1; i < vecSize; ++i )
00870                 {
00871                         string& posOrFec = vec[i];
00872                         // posOrFec is a feature itself
00873                         if( isDictFeature( posOrFec.c_str() ) )
00874                         {
00875                                 //don't insert duplicate entry
00876                                 if( usedFeatures.find(posOrFec) == usedFeatures.end() )
00877                                 {
00878                                         ostream << word << "," << posOrFec << endl;
00879                     ++count;
00880                                         usedFeatures.insert(posOrFec);
00881                                 }
00882                         }
00883                         else
00884                         {
00885                                 string* fec = getMapValue( posFeatureMap_, posOrFec );
00886                                 //don't insert duplicate entry
00887                                 if( fec )
00888                                 {
00889                                         if( usedFeatures.find( *fec ) == usedFeatures.end() )
00890                                         {
00891                                                 ostream << word << "," << *fec << endl;
00892                         ++count;
00893                                                 usedFeatures.insert( *fec );
00894                                         }
00895                                 }
00896                                 else
00897                                         cerr << "Can't find POS for " << posOrFec << endl;
00898                         }
00899                 }
00900 
00901                 if( usedFeatures.empty() && defaultFeature_ )
00902                 {
00903                         ostream << vec[0] << "," << *defaultFeature_ << endl;
00904             ++count;
00905                 }
00906         }
00907 
00908     return count;
00909 }
